divs: Sighting DetailsI have been taking photos of these events for 3 years now and have roughly 250 ohotos at diffent months ,years,dates all showing the same pattern.The police always call it a firebasll on scanner and people that stop at Alliance Gov. airport to watch these objects take off somehow are hit with a microwave New defense system that enables them and makes them unconsianse. The scanner always says male or female consciense and breathing then medics pick up the onlookers still passed out and then thier vehicals are towed away. The Gov. is using live residents as test rats for thier experimental non- killing ufo ray machine and someone should contact me to see my photos that are 100% real.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: RED,Blue,White twinkle then rotating brite yellow to orange then extrem white
Object Shape: Circle, Diamond, Fireball, Flash, Star-like, Triangle, Other, Unknown
